com.netflix.servo.monitor

Class ContextualCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.monitor.AbstractContextualMonitor<java.lang.Long,Counter>
      • com.netflix.servo.monitor.ContextualCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompositeMonitor<java.lang.Long>, Counter, Monitor<java.lang.Long>, NumericMonitor<java.lang.Long>

    public class ContextualCounter
extends AbstractContextualMonitor<java.lang.Long,Counter>
implements Counter
    Composite that maintains separate simple counters for each distinct set of tags returned by the tagging context.
